thread.title: Regal Announces $100 Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Ultimate Ticket
thread.title_full: Regal Announces $100 Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Ultimate Ticket

author: CS
title: Regal Announces $100 Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Ultimate Ticket

organizations.name: regal ultimate ticket for marvel studios

text:
SHARE Regal announces $100 Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Ultimate Ticket 
Regal Entertainment Group today announced the latest Regal Ultimate Ticket for Marvel Studios’ Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 , the highly anticipated sequel to the 2014 smash hit. With the Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Ultimate Ticket, you can see the movie every day while it’s in theatres with this exclusive offer available only at Regal. Only 1,000 of the Ultimate Tickets are available to purchase. Marvel Studios’ Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 , directed by James Gunn and distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures, will be released in theatres on May 5. 
“We are truly excited to have Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 as the first Marvel movie to receive the Ultimate Ticket treatment,” said Ken Thewes, Chief Marketing Officer at Regal Entertainment Group. “Wear out your Ultimate Ticket for Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 like your old mixtapes by seeing the movie every day in any format at Regal.” 
Guests can purchase the one-of-a-kind collectible ticket featuring the movie’s iconic “Awesome Mix Vol. 2” laser cut and etched into anodized steel for $100, while supplies last. Each card is personalized with the cardholder’s name inscribed permanently on the back. The Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Ultimate Ticket will only be available for sale online at RegalMovies.com . 
Along with the collectible ticket, Regal Crown Club members will receive 10,000 bonus credits, redeemable in the Crown Club Rewards Center online for a variety of Marvel Studios’ Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 items, including limited edition numbered art prints. Crown Club members can also cash in their credits to enter for a chance to win a Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Ultimate Ticket by visiting MyRegal.com . 
As a bonus, guests who purchase tickets to Marvel Studios’ Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 at Regal will receive a free digital comic book. Regal Crown Club members will also receive 2 additional digital comic books with their purchase. 
A Walt Disney Pictures and Marvel Studios production, the Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 cast includes the return of Chris Pratt ( Jurassic World , Parks and Recreation ) as Star-Lord, Zoe Saldana ( Avatar , Star Trek ) as Gamora, Dave Bautista ( SPECTRE ) as Drax, Vin Diesel ( xXx , Furious 7 ) as the voice of Groot, Bradley Cooper ( Joy , American Sniper ) as the voice of Rocket, Michael Rooker ( Slither , Jumper ) as Yondu, Karen Gillan ( Doctor Who , The Big Short ) as Nebula, and Sean Gunn ( Guardians of the Galaxy , Gilmore Girls ) as Kraglin. New cast members include Pom Klementieff ( Oldboy ), who plays Mantis, Elizabeth Debicki ( The Great Gatsby , Everest ), Chris Sullivan ( The Knick , The Drop ) and Kurt Russell ( The Hateful Eight , Furious 7 ) as Ego, the Living Planet. 
Set to the backdrop of Awesome Mixtape #2, the Guardians of the Galaxy sequel continues the team’s adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill’s true parentage. Old foes become new allies and fan-favorite characters from the classic comics will come to our heroes’ aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.
